coreAttributes.name: Inno-chan's gift
coreAttributes.description:
This is no ordinary bottle of wine, as it turns anyone who drinks it into a youko! Additional consumption will increase the number of Youko tails the drinker has.
[style.italicsMinorGood(While this is a debug-only item, it should be safe to use anywhere.)]

effectTooltipLines.line: [style.boldBad(Does not affect unique characters or dolls)]

coreAttributes.applyEffects: #IF(npc.isDoll()) [style.italicsDisabled(This item does not work on dolls...)] #ELSEIF(!npc.isPlayer() && npc.isUnique() && (!npc.isSlave() || npc.getOwner().isPlayer())) [style.italicsDisabled(This item does not work on non-slave unique characters...)] #ELSEIF(npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_FOX_ASCENDANT && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_FOX_ASCENDANT_ARCTIC && npc.getSubspecies()!=SUBSPECIES_FOX_ASCENDANT_FENNEC) [##game.getCharacterUtils().reassignBody(npc, npc.getBody(), npc.getGender(), SUBSPECIES_FOX_ASCENDANT, RACE_STAGE_PARTIAL_FULL, true)] [#npc.setTailCount(1, true)] [style.italicsFox([npc.NameIsFull] now [npc.a_race]!)] #ELSE [#npc.incrementTailCount(1, true)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: Opening the bottle of Inno-chan's gift, [npc.name] [npc.verb(tilt)] [npc.her] head back and [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc.her] waiting [npc.lips]. The heady fragrance of rich red wine wafts from the neck of the newly opened bottle, which is soon joined by a rich, sweet taste that lingers on [npc.namePos] [npc.tongue] well after [npc.sheHas] had [npc.her] fill.
